# Libraries

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(rvest)
```

# Attempt to scrape

```{r}
## provide the URL and name it something (in this case, url).
url <- "https://www.badmintonstatistics.net/Reports?page=1&totalrows=157173&reportname=MostPointsH2H&category=%&year=2023&level=worldtour&country=%&sortcolumn=&sortdirection=desc"


## read_html() convert the html code from the URL into something R can read
tab <- read_html(url) |> 
  html_nodes("table") ## html_nodes can grab only the tables 
```

```{r}
test1 <- tab[[1]] |> html_table()
test1
```
